title: Can I Allow My Friend To Go On My Account To Boost It?
body:
Simple question really, Can I Allow My Friend To Go On My Account To Boost It?

you may ask why, the answer is simple, Im bad at the game and dont want to waste money for a chinese booster but you can be damn sure Im tempted to do it because its impossible to gain LP in my elo so either I get my friend to play on my account for me or I just lose all my LP, I do hope you'll allow me to do this after all this is a problem YOU created by matching me with a bunch of bad players.
